title: Lotus
description:
A pink lotus flower in full bloom.

May be used to represent beauty, purity, calmness, or serenity. 

May also be used along with ðŸ§˜ Person in Lotus Position to represent yoga or meditation.
apple_vendor_description: The lotus emoji on Apple devices blossoms with a serene beauty, its petals unfurling in soft shades of pink and white, enhanced by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and gentle highlights.  Each petal is meticulously rendered with smooth gradients, giving the impression of delicate texture and ethereal grace.  Symbolizing purity, enlightenment, and spiritual awakening, this emoji brings a sense of tranquility and deep meaning to digital conversations.
